trans-unit.source: Publish-Module
trans-unit.target: Publish-Module

trans-unit.source: Publishes a specified module from the local computer to an online gallery.
trans-unit.target: Publishes a specified module from the local computer to an online gallery.

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: The **Publish-Module** cmdlet publishes a module to an online NuGet-based gallery by using an API key, stored as part of a user's profile in the gallery.
trans-unit.target: The **Publish-Module** cmdlet publishes a module to an online NuGet-based gallery by using an API key, stored as part of a user's profile in the gallery.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the module to publish either by the module's name, or by the path to the folder containing the module.
trans-unit.target: You can specify the module to publish either by the module's name, or by the path to the folder containing the module.

trans-unit.source: When you specify a module by name, **Publish-Module** publishes the first module that would be found by running `Get-Module -ListAvailable <Name>`.
trans-unit.target: When you specify a module by name, **Publish-Module** publishes the first module that would be found by running `Get-Module -ListAvailable <Name>`.

trans-unit.source: If you specify a minimum version of a module to publish, **Publish-Module** publishes the first module with a version that is greater than or equal to the minimum version that you have specified.
trans-unit.target: If you specify a minimum version of a module to publish, **Publish-Module** publishes the first module with a version that is greater than or equal to the minimum version that you have specified.

trans-unit.source: Publishing a module requires metadata that is displayed on the gallery page for the module.
trans-unit.target: Publishing a module requires metadata that is displayed on the gallery page for the module.

trans-unit.source: Required metadata includes the module name, version, description, and author.
trans-unit.target: Required metadata includes the module name, version, description, and author.

trans-unit.source: Although most metadata is taken from the module manifest, some metadata must be specified in **Publish-Module** parameters, such as *Tag, ReleaseNote, IconUri, ProjectUri,* and *LicenseUri*, because these parameters match fields in a NuGet-based gallery.
trans-unit.target: Although most metadata is taken from the module manifest, some metadata must be specified in **Publish-Module** parameters, such as *Tag, ReleaseNote, IconUri, ProjectUri,* and *LicenseUri*, because these parameters match fields in a NuGet-based gallery.

trans-unit.source: The RequiredVersion parameter allows you to specify the exact version of a module to be published.
trans-unit.target: The RequiredVersion parameter allows you to specify the exact version of a module to be published.

trans-unit.source: The Path parameter also supports the module base path with the version folder.
trans-unit.target: The Path parameter also supports the module base path with the version folder.

trans-unit.source: The Force switch parameter on Publish-Module cmdlet bootstraps the NuGet.exe without prompting.
trans-unit.target: The Force switch parameter on Publish-Module cmdlet bootstraps the NuGet.exe without prompting.

trans-unit.source: Cmdlet syntax
trans-unit.target: Cmdlet syntax

trans-unit.target: Cmdlet online help reference

trans-unit.target: [Publish-Module](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=398575)

trans-unit.target: Example commands

trans-unit.source: Publishing a module with dependencies
trans-unit.target: Publishing a module with dependencies

trans-unit.source: Create a module with dependencies and version range specified in RequiredModules property of its module manifest.
trans-unit.target: Create a module with dependencies and version range specified in RequiredModules property of its module manifest.

trans-unit.source: **Note:**
trans-unit.target: **Note:**

trans-unit.source: \* is supported only in MaximumVersion and also it should be at the end of version string.
trans-unit.target: \* is supported only in MaximumVersion and also it should be at the end of version string.

trans-unit.source: \* is replaced with 999999999 in the version object.
trans-unit.target: \* is replaced with 999999999 in the version object.

trans-unit.source: Publish ModuleWithDependencies module with dependencies to the repository.
trans-unit.target: Publish ModuleWithDependencies module with dependencies to the repository.

trans-unit.source: Find ModuleWithDependencies module with its dependencies by specifying -IncludeDependencies
trans-unit.target: Find ModuleWithDependencies module with its dependencies by specifying -IncludeDependencies

trans-unit.source: Install the ModuleWithDependencies module with dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Install the ModuleWithDependencies module with dependencies.

trans-unit.source: Note that version ranges are honored during the dependency installation.
trans-unit.target: Note that version ranges are honored during the dependency installation.

trans-unit.source: Contents of ModuleWithDependencies2 module manifest file
trans-unit.target: Contents of ModuleWithDependencies2 module manifest file

trans-unit.source: External dependencies
trans-unit.target: External dependencies

trans-unit.source: Some module dependencies can be managed externally, in that case they should be added to the ExternalModuleDependencies entry in the PSData section of the module manifest.
trans-unit.target: Some module dependencies can be managed externally, in that case they should be added to the ExternalModuleDependencies entry in the PSData section of the module manifest.

trans-unit.source: If 'SnippetPx' is not available on the repository, below error will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: If 'SnippetPx' is not available on the repository, below error will be thrown.
